posts.title: Air Powered Racer Kit
posts.content: Put alternative fuel sources to the test by building yourself a toy car that runs on air. This kit is great for learning about the basics of propulsion via compressed air and comes with a built-in pump bar with a pressure meter for easy operation.

posts.title: Temperature Display Shower Head
posts.content: Quit playing the guessing game every time you jump in the shower! This helpful digital shower head features six different spray settings along with a small LED display that tells you the exact temperature of the flowing water.

posts.title: Smart Fitness & Activity Tracking Belt
posts.content: Keeping tabs on your daily physical activity is simpler than ever with WELT – the smart fitness and activity tracking belt. This stylish high-tech accessory comes with built-in sensors that measure your physical activity and then relay the info to your phone via Bluetooth.

posts.title: Hands-Free Food Storage Bag Holder
posts.content: Fill up zip-lock bags without spilling a single drop by using this hands-free food storage bag holder. It features adjustable arms that hold the ends of the plastic bag upright so that you can easily fill them up without needing any extra assistance.

posts.title: Lenticular Four Seasons Poster
posts.content: Witness the passing of all four seasons before your very eyes with this incredible lenticular nature poster. Depending on what angle you view the poster from, it depicts the tree in a different season of the year – which makes it amazing to hang beside a mirror!

posts.title: Car Seat Organizer
posts.content: Keep your car from looking like a pig sty by keeping everything in place using this car seat organizer. This handy device securely latches onto your car’s front seat to provide storage for everything from tissues to water bottles inside an insulated compartment.

posts.title: Existential Coloring Book
posts.content: Ponder the meaning of life while staying inside the lines when coloring with the existential coloring book. You’ll get a chance to bring some of our greatest thinkers to life as you color them in and complete the blank caption bubbles.

posts.title: Miniature Ice Cream Sandwich Maker
posts.content: Turn your kitchen into your very own personal self-serve ice cream bar with the miniature ice cream sandwich maker. With three different molds to choose from, you’ll be able to custom build your perfect ice cream sandwich – bring on the calories!

posts.title: Rubber Band Engineer Book
posts.content: One-up MacGyver by turning common materials into crafty contraptions with help from the Rubber Band Engineer book. This compelling read will turn you into a master tinkerer – showing you how to craft items like catapults and slingshot rockets.

posts.title: R2-D9 USB Car Charger
posts.content: Keep your phone fully charged while on the road by enlisting the services of the R2-D9 USB car charger. This little droid is just as helpful as its more famous cousin and fits snugly into the car’s cup holder as it charges your electronic device via USB.

posts.title: Starry Night Socks
posts.content: Pay homage to Vincent van Gogh while also keeping your feet warm with these Starry Night socks. Designed to look like the iconic painting, the Starry Night socks are comfy and are a great accessory to a Halloween costume or even cosplay outfit.

posts.title: Closet Air Purifier
posts.content: Help your clothes and linens stay smelling fresh while you’re not using them by hanging up the closet air purifier. This compact device employs advanced plasma breeze ionic technology to freshen the air and eliminate musty odors.
